Author: thyme1999
Text: It also makes every other thing I need to do much easier because I already feel in control enough to be responsible for other things. Like no matter how long my to-do list gets I can always pride myself on how well I’m handling everything with no food AND realize that your days get a whole lot longer and more productive when you aren’t spending time eating

Author: sadbucket
Text: i get where you're coming from. feeling in control is the most addicting aspect of restricting/fasting for me by far. doing so makes me feel like i have my shit together more than anything else. i know that in theory my eating habits/weight ≠ my self-worth but it *definitely* feels like it.  regardless of how well other things in my life are going, i feel out of control if i'm eating whatever i want. i just feel disgusted by myself constantly. it's like i need this to tolerate myself.
